Context: The Anna Lopez Memorial Scholarship was established in memory of Anna Lopez, a member of the support staff team at the Centre for Construction & Engineering at George Brown College. The scholarship is awarded to a student who has a good academic standing and has overcome or faced personal/financial obstacles to undertake their studies at George Brown. 100% of donations go directly towards supporting the scholarship. Recipients will receive a tax receipt for the full amount of their donation. For inquiries, contact Krisztina Arany from George Brown College Foundation at karany@georgebrown.ca or 416-415-5000 ext. 4356. The text also includes information about contacting George Brown College via phone (416-415-2000), TTY (1-877-515-5559), or email (ask.george@georgebrown.ca). Additionally, it mentions the option to sign up for updates about application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours and more on the website. However, no specific program information is mentioned in the text.
